c74object.name: sdt.explosion~
c74object.digest: Gases: Blast wave model for explosion sounds.
c74object.description: sdt.explosion~ simulates explosions with a Friedlander waveform. A feedback delay network is used to render scattering and turbulences. The sound model takes six control parameters, the blast time in seconds, the scatter time in seconds, the dispersion, the distance of the explosion in meters, the wave speed in meters per seconds, and wind speed, that is the propagation of the blast wind, in meters per seconds. The output is two audio signals representing respectively the blast wave and the blast wind.

objarg.name: scatter-size
objarg.digest: Size of the scattering delay lines, in samples (default is 44100)
objarg.description: Average length of the reverberation delay lines, in samples. Default is 44100, which allows for a maximum scatter time of approximately 100 s at a sampling rate of 44.1 kHz

objarg.name: propagation-size
objarg.digest: Size of the wave propagation delay lines, in samples (default is 4410000).
objarg.description: Length of the propagation delay lines, in samples. Default is 4410000, which allows for a maximum propagation time of approximately 100 s at a sampling rate of 44.1 kHz.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Bang triggers the blast wave model.

attribute.name: blastTime
attribute.digest: Duration of the initial pressure peak, in seconds.

attribute.name: scatterTime
attribute.digest: Duration of the turbulence tail, in seconds.

attribute.name: distance
attribute.description: Distance of the explosion from the listener, in meters.

attribute.name: waveSpeed
attribute.description: Propagation speed of the blast wave, in meters per seconds.

attribute.name: windSpeed
attribute.description: Propagation speed of the blast wind, in meters per seconds.

entry.name: signal
entry.description:
Outlet 0: Blast wave.
Outlet 1: Blast wind.
